synopsis.text:
While adjusting to the rigorous rural lifestyle of Ooezo Agricultural High School, Hachiken Yuugo, a once city-dwelling academic, finds himself immersed in the intricacies of agriculture and its impact on his peers. As he grapples with his future aspirations, Hachiken discovers the harsh and enchanting truths of the countryside. With each passing day, he evolves into a more empathetic and compassionate individual, learning the ropes of farm life and even landing the role of the Equestrian Club's vice-president.

As Hachiken and his friends delve deeper into their agricultural studies, they master the art of handling chickens, grooming cows, and understanding a farm worker's responsibilities. Amidst the challenges and conflicts that the new semester brings, Hachiken remains steadfast in his pursuit of self-discovery and camaraderie. From adopting stray puppies to witnessing thrilling jumping competitions, the group's shared experiences at Ezonoo Agricultural High School create lasting memories and foster personal growth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
